name: Easy custom css by webriti
author: Hari Maliya

sections.description:
The Easy Custom CSS plugin allows you to quickly change the apprearance of your site without editing theme files. It is a simple plugin which does one thing and does it well. Simply activate the plugin, create your custom css .

The Easy Custom CSS plugin works with any WordPress theme you have active on wprdpress.
Give Easy Custom CSS a try. We are sure you will like it.

In case you face any problem, contact us via the Forums.
sections.installation:
1. Download Easy Custom CSS plugin.
  2. Upload the Easy-custom-css folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress and Enjoy.
sections.changelog:
@version 1.0
1. Add .

@version 0.9
1. Help and support tab issue fix.
